jml.parser
Class DFA

java.lang.Object
  jml.parser.DFA
Direct Known Subclasses:
TokenDFA
public class DFA
extends java.lang.Object

Title: DFA Description: Defines if could be posible to arrive to a posible state from transition matrix, when recieves vector of wanted states point of entry and final point. Copyright: Copyright (c) 2004 Company: Universidad Nacional de Colombia

Version:
1.0
Author:
Jonatan Gomez

Field Summary
 int[] output
          Output array
 int state
          This variable represents the actual state of the transition, when we simulate it.
 int[][] transitionTable
          State transitions table, rows represent states, columns represent posible transitions, any number minor than 0 means that the transition is not posible

simulate

public int simulate(int start,
                    int[] input)
This function simulates transition, for a given vector, and a start point for that vector. Posible transitions are in transition table (transitionTable).

Parameters:
start - start point of input vector
input - input vector (transitions we want to make)
Returns:
index of the input vector, represents the point until transition was made
